questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a stage of pregnancy?
questions.answer: Fourth trimester

questions.question: What is the term for the organ that develops in the uterus during pregnancy, providing oxygen and nutrients to the growing baby?
questions.answer: Placenta

questions.question: Which of the following is a common discomfort during pregnancy?
questions.answer: Morning sickness

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of amniotic fluid?
choices: To provide nutrition to the fetus
To protect the fetus from physical shock
questions.answer: To protect the fetus from physical shock

questions.question: In the context of pregnancy, what does the term 'prenatal' mean?
questions.answer: Before birth

questions.question: Which of the following is an important aspect of nutrition during pregnancy in the Timorese context?
choices: Avoiding all local fruits and vegetables
Incorporating local foods rich in essential nutrients
questions.answer: Incorporating local foods rich in essential nutrients

questions.question: What is a key objective of creating a prenatal visit plan in this course?
choices: To ignore local customs and beliefs
To focus solely on medical procedures
To incorporate local customs and beliefs
questions.answer: To incorporate local customs and beliefs

questions.question: Which of the following is a recommended activity for prenatal support in Timor-Leste?
choices: Simple prenatal exercises suitable for Timorese women
questions.answer: Simple prenatal exercises suitable for Timorese women

questions.question: What is the term for an unborn offspring of a mammal, particularly an unborn human baby more than eight weeks after conception?
questions.answer: Fetus

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically considered a common pregnancy discomfort?
questions.answer: Improved eyesight

questions.question: What is an important consideration when discussing traditional Timorese remedies for pregnancy discomforts?
choices: Always prefer them over modern medicine
questions.answer: Assess their safety

questions.question: Which of the following is crucial for fetal development during pregnancy?
choices: Ensuring adequate intake of essential nutrients
questions.answer: Ensuring adequate intake of essential nutrients

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to creating a prenatal exercise routine for Timorese women?
questions.answer: Develop simple, culturally appropriate exercises

questions.question: Which of the following is an important aspect of prenatal support in Timor-Leste?
choices: Respecting and incorporating local cultural practices
questions.answer: Respecting and incorporating local cultural practices

questions.question: What is the purpose of learning about fetal development in this course?
choices: To understand the basic stages of pregnancy
questions.answer: To understand the basic stages of pregnancy

questions.question: Which of the following is a key component of prenatal nutrition education in Timor-Leste?
choices: Identifying local foods rich in essential nutrients
questions.answer: Identifying local foods rich in essential nutrients

questions.question: What is an important consideration when creating a prenatal visit plan?
choices: Incorporating both health checks and cultural sensitivity
Avoiding all discussion of traditional practices
questions.answer: Incorporating both health checks and cultural sensitivity

questions.question: Which of the following is a recommended approach to addressing pregnancy discomforts in Timor-Leste?
choices: Combining safe traditional remedies with evidence-based approaches
Discouraging women from seeking any relief
questions.answer: Combining safe traditional remedies with evidence-based approaches

questions.question: What is the importance of understanding local beliefs about pregnancy in Timor-Leste?
choices: To replace medical advice with traditional beliefs
questions.answer: To provide culturally appropriate support

questions.question: Which of the following is a key objective of prenatal support in this course?
choices: To focus solely on physical health
To provide emotional, physical, and informational support
questions.answer: To provide emotional, physical, and informational support

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to discussing nutrition during pregnancy in Timor-Leste?
choices: Combine nutritional science with local food knowledge
Recommend a single diet for all pregnant women
questions.answer: Combine nutritional science with local food knowledge

questions.question: Which of the following is an important aspect of prenatal exercise education in this course?
choices: Teaching exercises that are safe and culturally appropriate
Focusing only on Western exercise techniques
questions.answer: Teaching exercises that are safe and culturally appropriate

questions.question: What is a key consideration when discussing fetal development with clients in Timor-Leste?
choices: Explaining concepts in simple, culturally relevant terms
questions.answer: Explaining concepts in simple, culturally relevant terms

questions.question: Which of the following is an important skill for a birth doula in Timor-Leste when providing prenatal support?
choices: Bridging communication between clients and healthcare providers
questions.answer: Bridging communication between clients and healthcare providers

questions.question: What is the purpose of learning about common pregnancy discomforts in this course?
choices: To provide informed support and suggest appropriate remedies
To discourage women from seeking medical help
questions.answer: To provide informed support and suggest appropriate remedies

questions.question: Which of the following is a recommended approach to discussing prenatal care in Timor-Leste?
choices: Balancing evidence-based care with respect for local traditions
questions.answer: Balancing evidence-based care with respect for local traditions

questions.question: What is an important aspect of creating a prenatal visit plan in this course?
choices: Incorporating both health checks and cultural considerations
Avoiding all discussion of potential complications
questions.answer: Incorporating both health checks and cultural considerations

questions.question: Which of the following is a key objective of learning about fetal development in this course?
choices: To understand and explain basic stages of pregnancy
To replace the role of obstetricians
questions.answer: To understand and explain basic stages of pregnancy

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to addressing cultural beliefs about pregnancy in Timor-Leste?
choices: Respecting beliefs while promoting evidence-based care
questions.answer: Respecting beliefs while promoting evidence-based care

questions.question: Which of the following is an important consideration when discussing prenatal nutrition in Timor-Leste?
choices: Considering local food availability and traditions
Recommending a single diet for all pregnant women
questions.answer: Considering local food availability and traditions
